titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the renewable electricity production credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/31/2007--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the tax credit for producing electricity from certain renewable resources; and (2) redefine "Indian coal production facility" for purposes of the credit as a facility that produces Indian coal (thus eliminating certain requirements for and limits on the tax credit for electricity produced by such facility).
